metrics_conclusion: Salt In The Wounds has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Salt In The Wounds has sections analyzed in the following keys: E♭ Dorian, D♯ Locrian,  and B♭ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
